item.description:
Herbalism uses natural remedies including plant herbs to heal. Herbalism tends to incorporate the idea of holistic medicine which uses the physical, mental and spiritual aspects to make one healthy. Herbalists use all manner of plant preparations and herbs to promote health and healing. This class will introduce how to grow herbs, identify them in the wild, how to combine and use them in herbal preparations and remedies, etc.

Class to begin at 6PM with Open Circle at 7:30PM
Looking forward to seeing you there!
item.name: Class & Open Circle - Herbalism
